data.title: Hardest Bogart Movies Trivia Quiz
data.meta_description: A tour of some of his films. - test your knowledge in this quiz! (Author robert362)
data.text:
Quiz Answer Key and Fun Facts

1. 'Treasure of the Sierra Madre' was one of Bogart's best movies. Who (along with Walter Huston) was his co-star?

Answer: Tim Holt

Good job by Holt - and by Bogart as Fred C. Dobbs

2. Who played Bogart's romantic interest in 'The Maltese Falcon'?

Answer: Mary Astor

How many other movies with Mary Astor can you name?

3. Who stole the letters of transit in 'Casablanca' and asked Bogart to keep them?

Answer: Peter Lorre

A small role

4. Who played Bogart's girlfriend in 'High Sierra'?

Answer: Ida Lupino

The others pop up in other Bogart movies - especially Bacall, of course.

5. Bogart did a fine job as Captain Queeg in 'The Caine Mutiny'. Which one of the following was NOT in the movie?

Answer: Robert Ryan

Ferrer was a lawyer (as was E.G. Marshall). MacMurray and Johnson were naval officers.

6. Bogart played a tough guy in 'Petrified Forest'. Who was the star of the movie?

Answer: Leslie Howard

Ashley Wilkes himself

7. In 'Key Largo', the shoe is on the other foot: Bogart plays a good guy who is menaced by a thug. Who plays the hoodlum?

Answer: Edward G. Robinson

With Lionel Barrymore

8. Which actress had a small role as the bookstore clerk in 'The Big Sleep'?

Answer: Dorothy Malone

Early in her career

9. Which movie did NOT star Bogart?

Answer: Home From The Hill

'Hill' starred Robert Mitchum, George Peppard and George Hamilton

10. Who played Bogart's buddy in 'To Have and Have Not'?

Answer: Walter Brennan

Fine actor

Source: Author robert362

This quiz was reviewed by our editing team before going online.

Any errors found in FunTrivia content are routinely corrected through our feedback system.
